column3: School of Chemistry and Forensic Science
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at University of Kent   Gain advanced training under the supervision of leading experts and participate in cutting-edge chemistry research. The School's main research interests focus on materials for energy and electronics, and supramolecular, interfacial and synthetic chemistry.Based in a research lab, you undertake research on a project agreed with your research supervisor. On a research-focused Master's course, you take an interactive approach to learning, rather than attending traditional lectures. Seminars, workshops and lab meetings enable you to gain an in-depth understanding of the field.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
